item.description:
Raw Vegan Pot Luck in Hopkinton

Our raw vegan pot lucks have been a lot of fun! You do not have to be a gourmet raw chef to attend. A simple dish that tastes good is fine. You are invited to join us for a casual evening of fun and conversation.

We are happy to announce that long-time member Anastasia Smith is now an assistant organizer! She is going to be hosting a series of pot lucks in Hopkinton!

Raw Pot-luck: all those attending are requested to bring a 100% raw, organic, unprocessed, non-animal based (vegan with no honey) ready- to-serve dish for 8 - 12 people. Please bring a typed or neatly printed recipe list with your name on it to display next to your dish ideally with copies for people to take with them if they so choose.

**CASH PRIZE FOR THE BEST DISH**

This document may help answer questions about what is raw vegan and what isn't...
files.meetup.com/733136/Raw_Vegan_Food_List_v6.doc

Ideas for Raw Vegan (without honey) dishes to bring:
1. you could bring an organic salad
2. there are plenty of raw recipes available online
www.rawnewenglandcommunity.com/phpbb2/
www.living-foods.com/recipes
goneraw.com/recipes
www.rawsacramento.net/recipes.htm
www.rawfoodlife.com/Raw_Resources/Raw_Food_Recipes/raw_food_recipes.html www.shazzie.com/raw/recipes
www.rawganique.com/recipes.htm
3. most raw food books have raw recipes; and
4. organic fruit salad.

Organizer: Anastasia Smith
item.name: NEW Potluck: Hopkinton
